评论详情: I really like the warrior look and appeal of this leather bracelet. It's the perfect size to wear on your wrist. It goes with casual and formal wear, designed to be seen or masked underneath (either way, the warrior feel remains with you).  Durable, fits well (two adjustment snaps), perfect thickness, very well priced, and it maintains that leather scent. 😎

评论概述: The picture looked nice and I gave it a try after reading several ...
评论详情: I ordered the Men's Leather Bracelet on December 2nd 2016. The picture looked nice and I gave it a try after reading several reviews. The bracelet was delivered on the day promised at 9:27 a.m. It was in very large bubble lined envelope. When I opened the package, immediately I could tell it was a quality product. It came completely flat in a clear plastic covering. I had to let it warm up due the 5 inches of snow and cold we received today before I could manipulate it. After the bracelet was at room temperature I put it on. The fit, contrary to reports that it ran small, was very comfortable with several holes to spare. It is very appealing to the eye and had a nice leather smell to it. I would highly recommend adding this bracelet to your collection. You will not be disappointed in the fit and finish of this product.

Good appearance and the quality appears good, but it's more of a kid size fit. Third hole is just a bit snug, second hole doesn't allow the strap to stay under the keeper. If you have thick wrists it probably won't work for you. 1/2" to 3/4" longer would've gotten 5 stars.

评论概述: Great, but with a Single Flaw
评论详情: I love this bracelet.  I really do.  It's cool looking, feels great when it's on and I've gotten comments about it.  I've taken away one star for one reason.  The... well, I don't know what to call it.  The little metal tab that's supposed to hold down the loose end.  You know, like a belt loop.  I have a couple other leather bracelets, and they have just that, a little leather loop to slide the end into.  The problem with this one is that it's a thin loop of metal, and it moves.  So the result is that it's always moving away, allowing the end to slip out.  So every time I look down, the end of the strap is sticking out.  I took away another star for the pure frustration this causes me.  It's a beautiful bracelet, and I wear it nearly every time I go out, but it annoys the crap out of me.  If my wrist were smaller it would fit in further and probably not fall out, but I'm at the precise width to keep it from sitting in there properly.  A little leather loop would make this thing perfect.

评论概述: Could use a slight design mod
评论详情: UPDATE: only a few days of wear and the black on the outside lacing was worn off.  The material is not leather and not durable.  I still like the overall looks, I’ll need to break out a sharpie to color in the black.  I’m glad I didn’t spend much for it because it doesn’t seem like it will have a very long lifespan.  Knock off one more star.ORIGINAL: The item came just like the picture and seems to be of a quality in line with or slightly exceeding it’s price level.  It’s still brand new so the leather “squeaks” a bit, but I imagine that will go away as it gets broken in.  Only gripe is that I have to wear it one notch tighter that I’d prefer in order to keep the “tail end” underneath the strap retainer.  Seems like they should mod that design a bit, but I suppose if you have a smaller wrist than I do, that may not be a problem.  One star off for the strap retainer.  Otherwise no issues.

评论概述: 4th Time Ordering This Because People Love It!
评论详情: This is my 4th time ordering this bracelet because family and friends love it. The first time I ordered it and wore it, my eight year old nephew liked it and asked me if he can have it so I gave it to him and ordered another one. Sevond time, my aunt saw me wear it and liked it and wanted to get one for her grandkid so I gave it to her and ordered another one for myself....Third time, my best friend saw it sitting on my dresser and just flat out pocketed it and told me he is taking it home with him...so here I am ordering a 4th one for myself in hopes that nobody will take it from me as I will start directing people where to buy it on their own. Bracelet has good quality leather and you get the best bang for your buck. I highly recommend it.
